attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i have just seen a petition on here saying that people that are working should get ivf treatment free what about the people that dont work for good reasons only get one try on the nhs and we are treated like a postcode lottery i think people that have fertility problems should get at least three trys on the nhs because we didnt do this to ourselfs so why should we suffer and be called a postcode lottery

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
